channel.title: How to run disturbed 667/711 on mac?
channel.description: im having trouble running the client on mac. please help

item.title: How to run disturbed 667/711 on mac?
item.dc:creator: @death_fury death fury
item.description:
@death_fury wrote:

[quote=“jake.bellotti, post:3, topic:446002”]I do not know if this works or not, so do not count on my comment.
Since java is implemented into the Mac OSX, couldn’t you just open the loader.class by double clicking?[/quote]

You could on most clients, but this one is not fully working.
But thanks for trying to help!

Read full topic

item.title: How to run disturbed 667/711 on mac?
item.dc:creator: @magemaniac33 magemaniac33
item.description:
@magemaniac33 wrote:

Can you use VMware like Virtual box? It supports OS/X so use windows xp or windows 7 iso you can download on the internet unless you already have one.

https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads
